FIR filter designed with
http://t-filter.appspot.com

sampling frequency: 80000 Hz

* 0 Hz - 500 Hz

  actual attenuation = -1000 dB

* 600 Hz - 3500 Hz
  gain = 1
  desired ripple = 5 dB
  actual ripple = 14.171283660245024 dB

* 4000 Hz - 40000 Hz
  gain = 0
  desired attenuation = -40 dB
  actual attenuation = -30.895968835495353 dB

*/
